name: Pixelcat's ice cream
description:
Pixelcat's ice cream

(my contain jumpscares)

a 7 hour fnaf inspired game.

Pixelcat's ice cream is closed for the night and you were left behind to defend yourself. Close the doors only when necessary, and don't run out of power.

Pc controls: 

up/down arrow keys: open and close cams. 

left/right arrow keys: switch between cameras.

mouse: open and close doors

Mobile controls:

swipe up/swipe down: open and close cams. 

swipe left/swipe left: switch between cameras.

touch: open and close doors
